replies.body: The PBE is currently down for maintenance per the [PBE status page](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe).  It won't be possible to sign-up or create an account during this period.  Bookmark the status page for more updates, and hang tight!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=UrE0Owp9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-25T21:20:58.333+0000)
>
> The PBE is currently down for maintenance per the [PBE status page](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe).  It won't be possible to sign-up or create an account during this period.  Bookmark the status page for more updates, and hang tight!




How long will it take until its back up? Its just a maintance or a reboot of the sign up system?  I am very exicted for this, because I wait for 3 years now for PBE, but don't get accepted yet. I hope this new system makes is more clear
